name: Aluminium nitrate
desc: Aluminium nitrate is a white, water-soluble salt of aluminium and nitric acid, most commonly existing as the crystalline hydrate, aluminium nitrate nonahydrate, Al(NO3)3·9H2O.
Other names:
Nitric acid, Aluminum salt
aluminum nitrate
aluminium(III) nitrate
Solubility in water:
anhydrous:
60.0 g/100ml (0°C)
73.9 g/100ml (20 °C)
160 g/100ml (100 °C)
nonahydrate:
67.3 g/100 mL
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
